hero.title: Comfortable Independent Houses for Rent in Sector 77 Gurugram
description: Sector 77 Gurugram is a well-developed residential locality in New Gurugram, known for its planned infrastructure, green surroundings, and peaceful living environment. Tenants searching for a house for rent in Sector 77 Gurugram prefer this area due to its smooth connectivity to NH-48, Southern Peripheral Road (SPR), and major employment hubs of Gurugram. The sector is surrounded by reputed schools, hospitals, shopping malls, local markets, and daily convenience stores, making it ideal for families and working professionals.

Independent houses in Sector 77 offer spacious layouts, better privacy, and a calm neighborhood atmosphere compared to high-density apartment complexes. The locality suits families, corporate tenants, and professionals who value comfort and long-term rental stability. Choosing a house for rent in Sector 77 Gurugram means enjoying a balanced lifestyle with modern amenities, good connectivity, and a secure residential setting.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Houses for Rent in Sector 77 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Common tenant questions related to house for rent in Sector 77 Gurugram.

faqs.question: Is Sector 77 Gurugram a good location to rent a house?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 77 is a planned and developing locality with good connectivity, modern amenities, and a peaceful residential environment.

faqs.question: What types of houses are available for rent in Sector 77?
faqs.answer: Independent houses from 4 Marla to 14 Marla are available, suitable for different family sizes and budgets.

faqs.question: Is Sector 77 suitable for family living?
faqs.answer: Yes, the area offers nearby schools, hospitals, parks, and shopping centers, making it family-friendly.

faqs.question: Are furnished houses available for rent in Sector 77?
faqs.answer: Both furnished and semi-furnished houses are available depending on the property and landlord preferences.

faqs.question: What is the average rent in Sector 77 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: Rental values depend on plot size, location, and furnishings, but Sector 77 offers competitive rental options.

faqs.question: How is connectivity from Sector 77?
faqs.answer: Sector 77 is well-connected via NH-48, SPR Road, and major city roads.

faqs.question: Are bachelors allowed to rent houses in Sector 77?
faqs.answer: Some landlords allow bachelors, while others prefer families. It depends on individual owner policies.

faqs.question: Is Sector 77 safe for tenants?
faqs.answer: Yes, the locality is considered safe with gated communities, security services, and active residential areas.
